name: One Tiny Plant
description:
Made in 72 hours for the 46th Ludum Dare. Go and leave a rating!

You are the tiniest of plants, just trying to make it big in the world. Don't let this world get you down, you can do it little plant!

Defend the plant through three stages, each with unique gameplay mechanics and opponents.

Controls:

- Controlled by the mouse

Update 1.1:
- updated to remove game-ending crash
